snippet.title: The first video on the start of the dungeon work
snippet.description:
The graphics still a bit glitchy (can see threw walls) working on that :)
The audio will be more fine tuned, but when a hostible mob/npc/object is near the player the music will change as a warning
Currently no AI work done yet, just working on more random generator code and stuff
Doors are animated but i sped up the animations for this just so its quicker, normaly you will watch the doors open and can slowly open or get a peek before opening so you know what you are about to walk into :)
